text: Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again. 

The power of Mana is returning.

The power of Mana is returning. The people discover they have magical powers that can protect them.

The power of Mana is returning. The people discover they have magical powers that can protect them. The aliens, however, are not going to let that happen.

The only way to destroy it is to destroy the shield. So they brainstorm about what they should do next. They decide to send a spy into the human world to find out how they can destroy the shield. The spy found out all they could but was overtaken and brainwashed by the peoples' returning power. They caught the spy and now he would be their spy. The Mana of the people went up to full strength and they knew from their newly gained spy that the aliens were still wasting time trying to destroy the tree. While they were distracted by this the people were able to blow up the alien planet without them knowing what was coming. And they were able to replenish their numbers and live happily ever after, without the threat of the hostile aliens.
